name: nativescript-animate-sass
description: Use animate.css on your Nativescript + SASS apps
author: Jeremiah Ogbomo <jeremiahogbomo@gmail.com>

scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd src; tns plugin remove nativescript-animate-sass; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.prepare: cp package.json packagedev.json && mv packagepublish.json package.json
scripts.complete: mv package.json packagepublish.json && mv packagedev.json package.json
scripts.push-pub: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run prepare && npm publish && npm run complete
